alert.note: Alert for Coke; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 3:56PM CDT until June 17 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL COKE AND NORTHWESTERN RUNNELS COUNTIES... At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wilmeth, or near Norton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Norton around 405 PM CDT. Wingate around 420 PM CDT. Hatchel around 440 PM CDT. Winters around 445 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pumphrey, Wilmeth and Drasco. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
